short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts songs from a YouTube song playlist video and converts it to a Spotify playlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert a Youtube video containing multiple songs into your own Spotify playlist.
- If the video contains a playlist, the Spotify button will extract the playlist from the video.

Support for Apple Music coming soon!
